summary: Two Non-resident Indians Pranai and Rochak come to Hyderabad to take up jobs in their friend's company and settle in Hyderabad and get caught up with local gangsters.
cast: Kuntaa Nikkil|Mast Ali|Sowmya Bollapragada|Raghu Kumar Karumanchi|Aziz Naser|Dheer Charan Srivastav|Ganesh Venkatraman
title: The Angrez
